item.title: Quick Introduction To DevOps
item.description: What is DevOps? According to GitLab, “DevOps combines development (Dev) and operations (Ops) to increase the efficiency, speed, and security of software development and delivery compared to traditional processes. A more nimble software development lifecycle results in a competitive advantage for businesses and their customers” Common misconceptions about DevOps One of the most common misconceptions is that DevOps is a specific job title or position within a business enterprise. In truth, DevOps is not a job title.
